Audio.Comments: Solitary Tinamou's chororocada song. This is the same individual heard in the background of [XC115825](http://xeno-canto.org/115825).Montane Forest. Lightweight rain drops can be heard in the recording. Recorded using Sony ICD-PX312 personal recorder.bird-seen:noplayback-used:no""
